title: Selected for RBI's cbdt pilot program with ICICI bank-is this a scam?
selftext: Got a WhatsApp message from what looks like a legit business account of icici bank saying I've been "selected" for their digital currency pilot program. Is this a scam or legit? Has anyone else got such a message? What should I do?
comments: Not a scam. I got the invite couple months ago and put in a few hundred rupees in digital currency. But not a single shopkeeper in my vicinity had digital rupee enabled. Couldn't even use it to pay via UPI. Transferred the money back to my account and uninstalled the app.
Ok. Thanks. Ya then probably gonna give this a pass. Btw, have you ever used funds from your icici account to buy crypto?
